title: league of legend keeps flickering when im playing  ( Boot Camp)
body:
i'm using a mac and i use bootcamp to play lol 
my bootcamp is window10 whenever i play league it will start flickering and occasionally crash

replies.body: I'd definitely try running a quick repair to make sure the files aren't damaged, but also try [**disabling the automatic graphics switching**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684#mq6) that macs can have enabled by default.
